LanguageData.SyntheticLung.label: Synthetic lung
LanguageData.SyntheticLung.description: A high-tech breathing replacement. Makes a soft whirring sound.
LanguageData.SyntheticStomach.description: An enhanced stomach augmented with synthetic fibres to decrease rejection rate.
LanguageData.SyntheticLiver.description: An enhanced liver augmented with synthetic fibres to decrease rejection rate.
LanguageData.SyntheticKidney.description: An enhanced kidney augmented with synthetic fibres to decrease rejection rate.
LanguageData.SyntheticHeart.description: A top-of-the-line heart replacement. Can last for over 30 years on a single charge.
